question: Who among the following was not among the seven members of the Drafting Committee of the Constituent Assembly?
explanation: The Drafting Committee of the Constituent Assembly consisted of 7 members- DR. B. R. Ambedkar (Chairman), N Gopalaswamy Ayyangar, Alladi Krishnaswamy Ayyar, Dr. K M Munshi, Syed Mohammad Saadullah, N Madhava Rau and T T Krishnamachari.
